THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.reinforcement: The thumbnail message ('Before you leave your marriage') is a condensed, direct version of the video title, immediately addressing the core dilemma discussed in the video. THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.contrasts_or_mismatches: No major contrasts; the thumbnail effectively matches the tone and content of the title. However, the thumbnail text is simpler and omits the specificity of '7 Things To Consider,' relying on intrigue to drive clicks.
